lead_paragraph: Soccer fans of a certain age will always remember Falcao at the World Cup in 1982 and his starring role alongside Zico, Socrates and Cerezo in one of the greatest Brazil sides of all time.

headline.print_headline: Olympic Hoodoo Still Haunts Hosts Brazil
headline.main: Olympic Hoodoo Still Haunts Hosts Brazil
